Title: Chequered Bench in Walnut Mango Finish

Details.Dimensions:: H 15 x W 44 x D 17 (All Dimensions in Inches)

Description: Reminiscent of yesteryears, Amberville serenades you to discover a distinctive elegance in homes through a seamless blend of classic and colonial styles. Curated for connoisseurs of fine furniture, the range exudes inimitable facets and impeccable craftsmanship that are second to none. Traditional Style takes inspiration from indigenous arts and craft originating from the Indian sub-continent and certain style periods pertaining to the early Baroque and French eras. Traditional furniture is synonymous with artistic embellishments, contrasting inlays, plush fabrics, decorative trims, crown moldings and intricate details. A Bench is a long seat on which multiple people may sit at the same time. Benches are typically made of wood, but may also be made of metal, stone, or synthetic materials. Benches typically have no back rest and can be sat on from either side.  Furniture bought on Pepperfry.com comes with a 3 Year Warranty against any manufacturing defects.
